full-spi-speed.help: Maximum SPI clock speed (Hz), as long as sufficient inter-byte spacing

full-spi-speed-byte-spacing.help: Required byte spacing in nanoseconds if full SPI speed is in use

low-spi-speed.help: Maximum SPI clock speed (Hz) if no inter-byte spacing

use-spi-spacing-api.help: Use SPI spacing API proposed in https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbed-os/pull/5353 to ensure spacing between bytes - either run at full speed with spacing, or low with no spacing

assume-spaced-spi.help: If not using SPI spacing API, assume platform has widely-spaced bytes in bursts, so use full clock speed rather than low.
